item.description:
Pork Pie Hat Jazz Series
Friday Oct 15, 10
8 p.m. - 10 p.m.
$15.00

Curtis Brothers Quartet feat. Donald Harrison.

Most quartets today consist of a horn and rhythm section. The horn is the leader, having the melody and conducting the ensemble. For "Rhythmic Prophecies," percussion is the base, the leader and inspiration. Rhythms are taken from literally all over the world and mixed and composed through a rarely seen jazz quartet combination. Africa is the essence of jazz and that is where "Rhythmic Prophecies" takes it.

http://curtisbrothers...
http://www.donaldharr...

Free street parking afer 6:00pm

Entrance:
Enter the Museum in the side entrance (Atheneum Square no.), where the Aetna Theater is. I was told to disregard the scaffolding, the entrance can be used there.
item.name: Pork Pie Hat Jazz Series
